data.name: Drowsiness Detection
data.description: Machine learning trained model used for detecting drowsiness of the person driving a vehicle. For safety purpose, in smart vehicles.

data.name: Image Search Engine
data.description: Python based image search engine, which gives results based on the image passed as query.

data.name: Face Detection and Recognition System (FDRS)
data.description: Fully functional project of face training and recognition using inbuilt trainer in Python, OpenCV.

data.name: Live Doodle Drawing
data.description: Training various class of images from Google Doodle dataset and recognise them using machine learning after doodles are drawn.

data.name: Image segregation using K-means
data.description: Segregating similar images from a large dataset of distinct images using K-means clustering.

data.name: Image Captioning
data.description: Ongoing. Used Flickr8k for image captioning.
